description:
Unable to get tasks. All tasks are blocked by circular dependencies. The diagnostics show:
- 8 TODO tasks are blocked by dependencies
- "Design User Authentication" is blocking 8 tasks
- "Design Tweet Management" is blocking 8 tasks  
- "Design Following/Followers" is blocking 8 tasks

This appears to be a circular dependency issue where all tasks are waiting for each other. Need guidance on how to break this dependency cycle.
